00067 class DccSendThread : public DccThread
00068 {
00069 public:
00070         DccSendThread(QObject * par,kvi_socket_t fd,KviDccSendThreadOptions * opt);
00071         ~DccSendThread();
00072 private:
00073         // stats: SHARED!!!
00074         uint           m_uAverageSpeed;
00075         uint           m_uInstantSpeed;
00076         quint64        m_uFilePosition;
00077         quint64        m_uAckedBytes;
00078         quint64        m_uTotalSentBytes;
00079         // internal
00080         unsigned long  m_uStartTime;
00081         unsigned long  m_uInstantSpeedInterval;
00082         quint64        m_uInstantSentBytes;
00083         KviDccSendThreadOptions * m_pOpt;
00084         KviMSecTimeInterval * m_pTimeInterval;             // used for computing the instant bandwidth but not only
00085 public:
00086         void initGetInfo();
00087         uint averageSpeed(){ return m_uAverageSpeed; };
00088         uint instantSpeed(){ return m_uInstantSpeed; };
00089         quint64 filePosition(){ return m_uFilePosition; };
00090         // sent ONLY in this session
00091         quint64 sentBytes(){ return m_uTotalSentBytes; };
00092         quint64 ackedBytes(){ return m_uAckedBytes; };
00093         unsigned int bandwidthLimit(){ return m_pOpt->uMaxBandwidth; };
00094         void setBandwidthLimit(unsigned int uMaxBandwidth){ m_pOpt->uMaxBandwidth = uMaxBandwidth; };
00095         void doneGetInfo();
00096 protected:
00097         void updateStats();
00098         virtual void run();
00099 };
